```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

s6 <- read_csv("../data/raw_data/u00730_s6_removed_clean.csv")
source("../scripts/helpers.R")

```

These models are not reported in the manuscript. 

model 1 

```{r}
u00730_mod_z_1 <- lm(z(social_connection) ~ condition, data = s6)

export_ols(
  u00730_mod_z_1, key_effects = "conditionyou_other"
)
```

model 2 

```{r}
u00730_mod_z_2 <- lm(z(enjoyment) ~ condition, data = s6)

export_ols(
  u00730_mod_z_2, key_effects = "conditionyou_other"
)
```

model 3 

```{r}
u00730_mod_z_3 <- lm(z(engagement) ~ condition, data = s6)

export_ols(
  u00730_mod_z_3, key_effects = "conditionyou_other"
)
```
